name: user-management-system
description: User Management System with Angular Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm install concurrently --legacy-peer-deps && cd backend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../frontend && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install -g @angular/cli@16.2.0 && ng build --configuration production
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
